sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Plus, Briefcase, DollarSign, Users, TrendingUp, Clock, CheckCircle, MessageCircle, Star, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Filter, Search, Calendar, Award } from 'lucide-react'; import Modal from './Modal'; const ClientDashboard = ({ user }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('projects'); const [isPostProjectModalOpen, setIsPostProjectModalOpen] = useState(false); const stats = [ { title: 'Active Projects', value: '5', change: '+2 this month', changeType: 'positive', icon: Briefcase, color: 'var(--colors-neutral-dark)' }, { title: 'Total Spent', value: '$2,850', change: '+$450 this month', changeType: 'positive', icon: DollarSign, color: 'var(--colors-primary-lime)' }, { title: 'Freelancers Hired', value: '12', change: '+3 this month', changeType: 'positive', icon: Users, color: 'var(--colors-secondary-purple)' }, { title: 'Avg. Rating', value: '4.8', change: 'Excellent', changeType: 'positive', icon: Star, color: 'var(--colors-neutral-medium)' } ]; const projects = [ { id: 1, title: 'Logo Design for Campus Startup', description: 'Need a modern, minimalist logo for our food delivery startup', freelancer: { name: 'Alex Chen', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=40&h=40&fit=crop&crop=face', rating: 4.9 }, budget: 200, status: 'in-progress', progress: 65, deadline: 'Dec 15, 2024', postedDate: 'Nov 28, 2024' }, { id: 2, title: 'Website Development', description: 'Build a responsive website with online ordering system', freelancer: { name: 'Sarah Johnson', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=40&h=40&fit=crop&crop=face', rating: 4.8 }, budget: 800, status: 'completed', progress: 100, deadline: 'Dec 10, 2024', postedDate: 'Nov 15, 2024' }, { id: 3, title: 'Social Media Marketing', description: 'Launch social media campaign for new product', freelancer: null, budget: 300, status: 'open', progress: 0, deadline: 'Dec 20, 2024', postedDate: 'Dec 1, 2024', proposals: 8 } ]; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'payment', title: 'Payment released to Alex Chen', description: 'Logo Design project completed successfully', amount: 200, time: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, type: 'proposal', title: 'New proposal received', description: 'Sarah Johnson submitted a proposal for Website Development', time: '4 hours ago' }, { id: 3, type: 'message', title: 'Message from Alex Chen', description: 'Project update: Initial concepts ready for review', time: '1 day ago' } ]; const getStatusColor = (status) => { const colors = { 'open': 'var(--colors-secondary-purple)', 'in-progress': 'var(--colors-primary-lime)', 'completed': 'var(--colors-primary-limeText)', 'cancelled': 'var(--colors-neutral-medium)' }; return colors[status] || 'var(--colors-text-secondary)'; }; const PostProjectModal = () => ( setIsPostProjectModalOpen(false)} title="Post New Project" size="large">
{ e.preventDefault(); setIsPostProjectModalOpen(false); }}>
